mapper.select: /* 관리자 로그인 화면에서 관리자 아이디 검증을 위한 권한 조회 */ SELECT member_level_code FROM `member` WHERE member_id = #{inputId};

SELECT member_id AS memberId, member_password AS memberPw, search_member_password_answer AS memberPwAnswer, member_level_code AS memberLevel, member_name AS memberName, member_phone_number AS memberTelNo, member_email AS memberEmail, member_join_YMD AS memberJoinYMD, member_withdrawal_YN AS memberWithdrawalYN FROM `member` WHERE member_id = #{inputId};
